service.name: Strategic Business Development
service.text: End-to-end strategy design and hands-on execution; Services & assets.

service.name: R&D Operations Management
service.text: Align your operations with your objectives, mitigate risks, and optimize project management and deliverables.

service.name: Fundraising Support & Readiness
service.text: Preparation of core documents for VCs and non-dilutive grants. Build and maintain your Data Room.

service.name: Build Your Team & Advisors
service.text: Connect with top-tier scientists and entrepreneurs. Open to join your venture as an advisor!

service.name: Scientific & Technical Due Diligence
service.text: Validate scientific soundness, team capabilities, and development risks. Hands on the code!

service.name: Market & Competitive Analysis
service.text: Assess market opportunity, positioning, and whitespace.

service.name: Venture Scouting
service.text: Identify the cutting-edge startups before someone else does.

service.name: Curated Founder Access
service.text: Introductions to vetted, interdisciplinary innovators aligned with your investment thesis.
